list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mechanism for keeping a door, lid, etc., fastened, typically operated only by a key of a particular form.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the key turned firmly in the lock
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chìa khóa biến thành một cách chắc chắn trong khóa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a short confined section of a canal or other waterway in which the water level can be changed by the use of gates and sluices, used for raising and lowering vessels between two gates.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was a lock every quarter of a mile
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có một khóa mỗi phần tư của một dặm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mechanism for exploding the charge of a gun.
a piece of a person's hair that coils or hangs together.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she pushed back a lock of hair

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fasten or secure (something) with a lock.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she closed and locked her desk
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đóng cửa và khóa bàn của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: restrict access to the full functionality or data of (a computer, mobile phone, file, etc.), especially by requiring a user to verify their identity with a passcode or other form of authentication.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: my computer is locked and I've forgotten my login info
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Máy tính của tôi bị khóa và tôi đã quên thông tin đăng nhập của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make or become rigidly fixed or immovable.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he locked his hands behind her neck
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta khóa tay sau cổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: go through a lock on a canal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we locked through at Moore Haven
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã khóa qua Moore Haven
